ValidationRule.description: Case validation to check when WOC is not null and case reasons fields are empty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DateValue(CreatedDate) > Date(2022, 05,09 ), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support'), ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Waiting for Customer Response'), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, '')), OR(ISPICKVAL(Closed_Case_Reason__c, '')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case Reason and Close Reason Required
